<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harmlessly Cute](/Feats.aspx?ID=1038) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm. You gain the [Shameless Request](/Feats.aspx?ID=838) skill feat as a bonus feat. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative checks when you roll [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) for initiative.
name: Harmlessly Cute
